CustomField.formula:
CASE(1, IF((( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2020-12-17 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-01-20 23:59:59')) || ISBLANK(CreatedDate)),1,0),'Janeiro',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-01-21 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-02-17 23:59:59')),1,0),'Fevereiro',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-02-18 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-03-22 23:59:59')),1,0),'Março',
IF(( CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE('2021-03-22 23:59:59') && CreatedDate < DATETIMEVALUE('2021-04-20 00:00:00')),1,0),'Abril',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-04-20 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-05-20 23:59:59')),1,0),'Maio',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-05-21 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-06-21 23:59:59')),1,0),'Junho',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-06-22 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-07-20 23:59:59')),1,0),'Julho',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-07-21 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-08-20 23:59:59')),1,0),'Agosto',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-08-21 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-09-21 23:59:59')),1,0),'Setembro',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-09-22 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-10-20 23:59:59')),1,0),'Outubro',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-10-21 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-11-19 23:59:59')),1,0),'Novembro',
IF(( CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-11-20 00:00:00') && CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE('2021-12-17 23:59:59')),1,0),'Dezembro',
' ')
CustomField.label: Competência criação
